name: the rooftop cat
description: poesy liang 梁小詩 created the first rooftop cat paintings in 2011. the rtc story unfolds of an ambitious cat who plots to fly to the moon to shine amongst the stars. poesy has a colourful personal history of adversity and resilience. the regional media awards that followed her humanitarian career as well as her widely reported life story, names her to be a formidable ally to reckon with.

name: the pirate's daugther
description: an imaginative tale of adventure and legacy, told through powerful visual storytelling.

name: running rabbit
description: a metaphorical journey of speed, escape, and freedom depicted through whimsical rabbit illustrations.

name: harry putter
description: a humorous and enchanting golf-themed parody with magical illustrations.

name: international bank of kindness
description: a symbolic initiative where kindness is a currency, promoting good deeds and compassion.

name: helping angels
description: a volunteer initiative bringing aid, joy, and support to people in need.

name: tuesday art angels
description: a recurring art session led by volunteers, inspiring creativity in children and seniors.

name: thursday tutoring
description: weekly tutoring sessions empowering underprivileged students through education and mentorship.

name: poesy empathy
description: a personal development program to foster empathy and emotional awareness through storytelling.

name: bald empathy movement
description: a bold statement of solidarity through hair shaving, raising awareness for cancer and empathy.

name: gratitude letters
description: an initiative encouraging people to write letters of appreciation to those who impacted their lives.
